name: Light Spirits
description:
The Village has been attacked and the Princess has been captured. Are you brave enough to venture forth and save them both ?!!

Collect Spells and a Weapon to fight the evils that await you.

Created in Unity and C#, my first 3D (Lite) RPG.

Thanks for downloading and giving the game a play. Feedback is very welcome

// About the Project

This is my first 3D Game I created over a few days - This game uses the Unity game engine and the magic of C#. This is a (short) indie game, the team is composed of a single solo dev
